title: Dacor Distinctive 36 Pro Gas Rangetop - DRT366SS
description:
Buy Dacor Gas Cooktop DRT366SS now - http://www.abt.com/product/41748/Dacor-DRT366.html
Shop Gas Cooktops - http://www.abt.com/category/465/Gas-Cooktops.html

Your dream kitchen would be complete with this beautiful new addition to our Distinctive line of luxury appliances. Our new Distinctive series combines the best of modern design with the culinary heritage of Distinctive Appliances Inc. the original name of Dacor. Achieve the super-specific simmer sear or sauté at ultra-low or ultra-high temps with our SimmerSear™ Burners that deliver up to 18000 BTUs of pure precision. Marvel at the Illumina™ Indicator Lights that glow Dacors signature flame-blue when the burners are on. And amaze yourself with our easy-to-use Continuous Platform Grates which provide an especially spacious cooking surface and interchangeable accessories that are worthy of a master chef.
Features
• Stylish Distinctive Design
• Angled Control Graphics are easy to read from a standing position
• Illumina™ Indicator Lights ensures a safer cooking experience by lighting up Dacors signature flame-blue when the burner is on.
• 2 SimmerSear™ Burners with Melting Feature (18000 BTU)
• 2 Sealed Gas Burners (15000 BTU)
• 2 Sealed Gas Burners (9500 BTU)
• Continuous Platform Grates allow heavy pots to slide easily; rubber feet allow grates to be used as trivets
• 2 12 Wide Continuous Platform Grates (DRT366S)
• 1 10 Wide Continuous Platform Grate (DRT366S)
• Perma-Flame™ - Automatically re-ignites flame when it goes out ensures your cooking experience remains uninterrupted
• Oversized Knobs for easy handling with push and turn safety feature
• Smart Flame™ Technology - reduces flame output under each grate finger protecting the finish and longevity of the grates
• One-Piece Porcelain Enameled Spill Basin allows for easy cleaning
• Raised Ventilation Compatible - ERV3615 / 3015
